message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to you, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. To start, I propose a price of $14,000 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of this product, $14,000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $13,000. What do you think?
Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering the value of the product to you, I believe we can find a middle ground. My counteroffer is $13,500 for the product.
